Description:
All one-and-two storey cottages are spacious and elegant with individual entrances and terraces, overlooking the sea, mountains, and park. The units come with double beds, shower rooms and kitchenettes en suite. The kitchens are furnished with fridges/freezes, 2-burner hobs and cooking utensils. The rooms are equipped with satellite TVs, air conditioning, safes and Wi-Fi hot spots. Closed secured premises, free parking space, and complimentary accommodation with add-on bed are available.

Guests can enjoy long park walks and mountain hikes, play tennis, and choose from numerous tours around Great Yalta and beyond it. For outdoor dining, there is an induvidual barbeque area in every cottage.
HotelFacilities: Visa Free self parking

Description:
HotelDescription#The hotel complex is located at the feet of Ai-Petri Mountain in the Bolshaya Yalta region, Koreiz area. It is placed 100 metres from the Black Sea.

This resort in Yalta features a private beach and 6 restaurants and bars. Guests can enjoy free use of the 2 pools, well-equipped gym and Wi-Fi access. Fresh seafood and gourmet cuisine is served to spoil guests' taste buds. Spa facilities include 9 saunas, Jacuzzis and a massage and beauty centre. Parking is available too.

This hotel offers a wide range of amenities and facilities, including a wellness centre and its own cable cars to and from the beach.

Description: Property Location Located in Yalta Alupka, 4-sezona Hotel is within the vicinity of Swallow''s Nest and Livadia Palace. This hotel is within the region of Livadia Beach and Alexander Nevsky Cathedral.Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 6 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring refrigerators and LED televisions. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed, and all rooms are furnished with single sofa beds. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Prepare your meals in the shared/communal kitchen. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including an outdoor pool and a seasonal outdoor pool. Description: This bed and breakfast is located in Alupka. Vorontsov park is a 2-minute walk away from the property, and free Wi-Fi is available throughout. All of the rooms at Alupka are heated, and most come with a private bathroom. Some have extra features like a separate living, a balcony, or a flat screen TV.

Description:
Property Location
With a stay at More Resort & Spa in Alushta, you''ll be near the beach and within the region of Nikita Botanical Garden.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 232 guestrooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and you can also request cribs/infant beds.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages and facials. You''re sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 5 outdoor swimming pools and a fitness center. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and supervised childcare/activities.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel''s dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. This hotel has 3 meeting rooms available for events.
HotelFacilities: American Express Beach umbrellas Spa tub Visa Beach/pool umbrellas Garden

Description: HotelDescription#The 63-room hotel welcomes guests into a lobby with 24-hour reception and check-out service, lift access and cloakroom. Guests may also use the hairdressing salon, the café or the bar/restaurant. Conference facilities and Internet access, also children's playground is available. The hotel offers room and laundry services and car parking. All 63 rooms come with excellent amenities, such as free high-speed Internet access and coffee making facilities. All rooms have a fully equipped bathroom with bath, shower and hairdryer. There are executive rooms, junior suites and suites to choose from and non-smoking rooms are available upon request. Each guestroom features a TV, a minibar, and individually regulated air conditioning and heating.

Description:
Property Location
Located in Bakhchisaray, Meraba is in the historical district and convenient to Orta Juma Jami and Bakhchisaray Palace. This guesthouse is within close proximity of Zincirli Madrasa and Bakhchisaray Cave Monastery.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 9 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and stovetops. Rooms have private furnished balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include desks and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided on a limited basis.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk and laundry facilities. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request).
HotelFacilities: Limited housekeeping Visa Yard

Description:
Griboff Hotel is located a 5-minute walk from sandy beach in Berdyansk. The hotel offers an outdoor childrens pool, garden and terrace. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout.

The hotel features air-conditioned rooms, decorated in classic style. All rooms come with a TV, fridge and minibar.

Local meals can be ordered upon request, and some rooms feature private kitchen. Guests can also play billiards and sing karaoke.

The distance to a water park and dolphinarium is 5 km from the property. Berdyansk Train Station and Bus Station are located a 15-minute drive from Griboff Hotel. Swimming pool is closed from Tue 01 Oct 2019 until Wed 01 Jan 2020

Description:
Just 200 metres from the Sea of Azov, this hotel in Berdyansk offers an indoor pool and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. International cuisine is served in the elegant restaurant.

Floor-to-ceiling windows, flat-screen TVs and minibars are features of all rooms at the Arle Hotel. Bathrooom comforts include bathrobes, toiletries and a hairdryer.

French, Italian, and Ukrainian specialities are served in the 1st-floor restaurant. A breakfast is provided each morning, and guests can eat on Arles large terrace in warm weather.

Relaxation is offered by Arles sauna. There is also a terrace where guests can sunbathe.

A 5-minute walk takes you to Berdyansk Train Station and Primorskaya Square in the city centre. Free private parking is provided on site.

Description:
With an indoor pool, free Wi-Fi and free parking, this hotel is just a 6-minute drive from the beach in Berdyansk. Its air-conditioned rooms include a flat-screen TV and refrigerator.

Elegant, individually furnished rooms with wooden floors are offered at the Strelets Hotel. Bathrobes, slippers and toiletries are provided.

Japanese and European cuisine is served in the Strelets Restaurant, and a continental breakfast is provided each day. After dinner, guests can relax in the bar or billiards room.

Further relaxation is offered by the Strelets sauna and hot tub. There is also a cosy TV lounge and an outdoor terrace.

The 24-hour reception staff can provide advice on local attractions. Berdyansk city centre is just a 15-minute walk away. Children will enjoy the water park at Berdyanskaya Kosa, a 15-minute drive away.

Description:
Just 20 metres from the sandy beach, this newly renovated hotel features a sauna, barbecue facilities and free Wi-Fi in public areas. A 24-hour front desk and a terrace are included.

The bright rooms and suites at the Maksim include a TV, seating area and a refrigerator.  Parquet floors feature throughout, and some rooms offers views of the Sea of Asov.

Ukranian and Uzbek cuisine is served in the Maksims bright restaurant, and drinks are available at the well-stocked bar. Guests are also free to prepare home-cooked meals in the hotels shared fully equipped kitchen.

The Maksim is 1 km from Berdyansk Water Park and 700 metres from a food market. Berdyansk Train Station is 2.5 km away. Please note that the hotel may contact you regarding prepayment of your booking.

Description:
Located directly on the Azov Sea beach on the Berdyansk Spit, this hotel features an outdoor swimming pool and a sauna. It offers air-conditioned rooms with a fridge.

Each room at Nike Hotel is decorated in neutral colours with a seating area and a kettle. Bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

Ukrainian and European cuisine are served in the Nikas restaurant, and meals can also be enjoyed on the terrace.

Guests of Nika can relax in the sauna with a plunge pool or on the sun terrace by the swimming pool, while free sun loungers and umbrellas are provided on the beach. Billiards and table tennis can be found on site.

Vulytsa Makarova bus stop is 20 metres from Nika Hotel, providing a direct link to Berdyansk Train Station. A shuttle service to Mariupol Airport (85 km) is available on request.

Description:
This hotel is located on the beach of the Sea of Azov in Berdyansk. Free Wi-Fi, free parking, a sauna and a 24-hour reception are featured at Bristol Hotel.

The bright, air-conditioned rooms offer warm-coloured interiors and classic-style décor. Each room includes a TV, and most rooms come with a private bathroom and a balcony.

Guests can also cook their meals in the shared fully equipped kitchen, complete with a dining area. A variety of cafés and restaurants can be found within a 5-minute walk of the hotel. Barbecue facilities are also on site.

A childrens playground is available for young guests.

Delfin bus stop is only 50 metres away, and Berdyansk Train Station is 2.5 km from Bristol Hotel. Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
It is not possible to stay at this property for Coronavirus (COVID-19) quarantine purposes.
Please note that the hotel will contact you directly regarding the prepayment of your reservation. Prepayment should be made within 24 hours after booking. The hotel reserves the right to cancel your reservation in case the deposit has not been transferred.

Description:
Located 15 minutes walk from the Azov Sea beach in Berdyansk Town, Chili Hotel features free Wi-Fi and a cafe. Rooms comoe with air conditioair conditioning and a fridge.

All the classic-style rooms at Chili include simple layout with a kettle. Bathrooms are fitted with a shower.

Local dishes, as well as breakfast, can be enjoyed in the cafe with a terrace.

Berdyansk Train Station is 1.5 km from Chili Hotel, offering a link to Zaporizhzhya City. Please note that the hotel will contact you directly regarding the prepayment of your reservation. Prepayment should be made within 5 days after booking. The hotel reserves the right to cancel your reservation in case the deposit has not been transferred.

Description:
Free Wi-Fi and a snooker lounge at offered at this hotel in Berehove town centre. Zolota Pava is situated in a historic building, just 500 metres from Berehoves hot springs.

Rooms at Zolota Pava Berehove are simply furnished with traditional wooden furniture. All rooms are air-conditioned and include cable TV and a private bathroom.

Breakfast and a selection of Hungarian and Ukrainian dishes are served in the restaurant. Drinks can be enjoyed in the traditional pub or on the terrace.

Guests are welcome to relax in the gym and sauna. A games room is also available.

Private parking is free at Zolota Pava, and Berehove Train Station is 2 km away. The border with Hungary is 7 km away. Please inform Zolota Pava in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Description:
HeadLine : In Berehove

Location : With a stay at Family House Lambert in Berehove, you ll be 10.7 mi (17.2 km) from Thermal waters Kosino and 17.8 mi (28.6 km) from Palanok Castle. This hotel is 17.9 mi (28.8 km) from Pochaiv Icon Cathedral and 18 mi (28.9 km) from St. Cyril and Methodius Monument.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 16 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Housekeeping is provided daily, and irons/ironing boards can be requested.

Dining : Enjoy a satisfying meal at Lambert serving guests of Family House Lambert. Cooked-to-order breakfasts are available daily from 8:30 AM to noon for a fee.

Description:
Featuring a bowling alley, fitness centre and restaurant, Magnum offers rooms with air conditioning and heating. Free Wi-Fi access is available in all areas of the hotel.

The rooms come with classic decor and satellite TV. The suites have a separate lounge area with a minibar. Each private bathroom includes free toiletries.

Guests can go bowling in the bowling alley, enjoy a game of billiards, or relax in the sauna. There is also a childrens playground on site. The restaurant serves a la carte meals, and drinks are available at the bar.

Magnum is conveniently located just 1.6 km from the historical city centre of Berehove and Berehove Train Station. The thermal water sources in Kosino are 12 km from the hotel.

Description:
Located in Berehove, 27 km from Mukacheve, Mirage Hotel features free WiFi access and free private parking.

Rooms are air-conditioned and feature a private bathroom. Some units offer a kitchen and balcony.

Guests are invited to the on-site restaurant.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Description:
Praktik Hotel & Restaurant features a garden, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Berehove. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a childrens playground. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests.

At the hotel, every room has a wardrobe, a TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels.

Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and American options.

Praktik Hotel & Restaurant offers a barbecue.

The nearest airport is Uzhorod International Airport, 71 km from the accommodation.

Description:
Hotel Helikon features a garden, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Yanoshi. This 3-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi.

The area is popular for hiking and cycling, and bike hire is available at this 3-star hotel.

The nearest airport is Uzhorod International Airport, 65 km from the hotel. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Description:
Offering a restaurant and a tennis court and free Wi-Fi, FKoka is located in Berehove.

Each room here will provide you with air conditioning. There is also a kitchenette in in the apartment.

Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer.

At FKoka you will find a garden, a terrace and a bar. Other facilities offered at the property include shops (on site). The property offers free parking. Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.

Hotel "Viktoria" is situated in Berehove and has a terrace and a shared lounge. All rooms feature a kitchenette and a private bathroom. Free WiFi is available.

At the hotel, every room has a wardrobe. Hotel "Viktoria" offers some units that feature a balcony, and all rooms come with a kettle. At the accommodation, the rooms have a TV with satellite channels.

Description:
Located in Berezivka city centre, this hotel is 80 km from Bukovel Ski Resort. It comes with a 24-hour reception, sauna and free Wi-Fi. A shuttle to the airport is provided on request.

Decorated with elegant furniture, rooms at Chateau Royal Hotel are air-conditioned. They come with a flat-screen TV and minibar. Private bathrooms are fitted with free toiletries.

The nearest bus stop, providing access around the city, is a 5-minute walk from the hotel. Ivano-Frankivsk Train Station is 20 minutes drive from Chateau Royal Hotel. Ivano-Frankivsk International Airport is 5 minutes drive away. Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
Please inform Chateau Royal Hotel in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Food & beverage services at this property may be limited or unavailable due to Coronavirus (COVID-19).
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), wearing a face mask is mandatory in all indoor common areas.
Please note that for group bookings (3 rooms and more) different policies apply.

Description:
Located in Rokytne, Lisotel features an indoor pool, spa and wellness centre and sauna.

The rooms offer a seating area, flat-screen TV, fridge, electric kettle and hairdryer.

Guests can dine in the propertys restaurant or use on-site barbecue facilities. There is also a bar on site. Room service and breakfasts in the room are provided upon request.  An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including horse riding, billiards, table tennis, fishing and cycling. WiFi is free and available in public areas.

Rokytne Train Station is 4.5 km away, and Boryspil International Airport is 130 km from Lisotel. Please note that the hotel will contact you directly regarding the prepayment of your reservation. Prepayment should be made within 5 days after booking. The hotel reserves the right to cancel your reservation in case the deposit has not been transferred.

Please note, that there is a mandatory surcharge of UAH 6000 for the New Years Gala dinner and program for guests staying from 30.12.21 to 03.01.22.

Description:
Featuring a sauna, plunge pool and rooms with a balcony, Hotel Fiesta overlooks the Belgorod-Dniester central city park. It is just 350 metres to the ancient ruins of Tyras and the Akkerman Fortress.

Rooms are soundproofed and offer cable TV, free Wi-Fi and air conditioning. They are warmly decorated with carpeted floors and bright fabrics.

The Fiesta offers a bar and restaurant, which serves European cuisine and traditional regional dishes. A continental breakfast is available in the rooms. On sunny days guests can also make use of the hotels barbecue facilities.

It is only 350 metres to the picturesque banks of the River Dniester, and the surrounding area provides the ideal base for hiking.

Belgorod Dniester Station is 1.5 km away, and secure on-site parking is possible.

Featuring a solarium and a traditional cuisine restaurant, this hotel is located in Borshchiv town, 50 metres from the Church of Mother of God. It offers rooms with a TV.

Each room at Hotel Hostinniy Dvir is decorated in classical style with wooden furnishings. All rooms have a TV, and a shower is provided in the bathrooms.

The on-site restaurant with a terrace serves Ukrainian cuisine, and barbecue facilities are also available.

Borshchiv Train Station is 1.5 km from Hotel Hostinniy Dvir, and Ivano-Frankivsk Airport is 130 km away.

Description:
Air-conditioned rooms, free Wi-Fi and European cuisine are offered by this traditional-style hotel in Borispol.

The Stara Vezha Hotel has classic rooms and suites with a flat-screen TV and classic décor. All include orthopedic beds and a private bathroom with free toiletries. Extra facilities are provided for families with children.

Ukrainian and European dishes are served in the country-style restaurant on the Stara Vezhas ground floor.

The reception at Hotel Stara Vezha is open 24 hours a day. Guests can book sightseeing tours and theatre tickets here.

Drivers are welcome to use the Stara Vezhas free car park. Kiev is 20 km away, and the M03 Kyiv-Kharkiv motorway is just 1 km away. In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Please note that the shuttle service from or to the airport is subject to 140 UAH one way.
